content:
As robot technology advances you'll want to make efforts to keep ahead of the curve. You don't want to find yourself in the unenviable position of having super lame robot designs. comments.comment: I'm going to like these new designs ironically until it's decided that they're hip.
What's wrong with the old designs!?!?
